item.title: Rubbish not cleaned for weeks & thrown on floor, 9th June
item.description:
Rubbish has been left in Canterbury Place Car park for weeks and the cleaners have not come to clean it. There are no bins in the car park so people have started to throw their rubbish on the floor. This is now causing rats, foxes and many birds which in tell cause a mess on in the car park and everyone’s car. Can the cleaners please come and clean the rubbish as we deserve to have a clean car park and not have our cars damaged by these animals and fear to park.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ambergate Street, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Again - fly tipping, 9th June

item.title: Commercial waste being stored on public pavement, 9th June
item.description:
Can you inform the Arch Company about this as well, as Southwark Council. Nothing seems to have been done about it over the past few months. The bins are form the business in the Arches and they have their own space for the bins according to the planning permission.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gordon Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping moved to make room for more, 9th June
item.description:
Number 8 Penry street is the site where numerous homeless men have set up camp. They steal cases and parcels , check for goodies then discard. They have moved the crap from 8 Penry street tonight to Marcia Road - 2 sites - tree and electricity box - PLEASE GET RID OF THESE ANTISOCIAL PEOPLE !!!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marcia Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
